docs.title: Data
docs.text: really feel that i have been scammed by at&amp;t. i used to have a 15gb plan, and i had it for years with no problems. there was only one time i was going to go over and a customer service person explained something that happened when i updated my phone. problem solved. then suddenly in my january bill, if i didn't have rollover i would've gone over. in my february cycle i was about to go over with half my month left. of course i had to increase my data package to 25, which also increased my bill. now suddenly i have all this data and half way through this cycle i've only used 2.9! how is this possible?!? i really fee like i was scammed somehow. i have done nothing differently. it makes me very angry and now there's nothing i can do about it. i'm so happy i get to pay more for something i'm not even going to use.

docs.title: Can't view data
docs.text: 'm unable to view amount of data and texts used for current period. (but your reps can). i have done three support chats. first i was blamed. second one said it was cuz i didn't update the iphone app. nice try. i do all ios and app updates the second they come out. and i said i can't view on web either. third rep last night said system wide for all customers. which is it and more importantly when will this be fixed. i like to monitor my data daily.

docs.title: Chile
docs.text: will be in chile for a week. i don't want to talk on my cell phone but might want to text. can i text a few times (maybe 20) without having to purchase an international plan which costs $10/day? i am on an individual plan with 3 gb.

docs.title: Over 1000 dollars in international charges??!
docs.text: recently went to jamaica , because i travel very often i always call my phone service before to add an international plan . after adding the plan the representative told me that calls coming in i won't be charged for but calls that i make out i will . while being in jamaica my bill went to over 1000 dollars and i couldn't understand why i called again to speak to a representative to see what i could do because over 1000 dollars is impossible for me as a college student to pay by myself. i told her what the first representative told me about incoming calls but she said there was no record of that so there was nothing she could do but extend the deadline for me to pay which is in 3 days but i am still getting late charges added to the 1,000 and i still don't know how i am going to pay that and i really don't think it's fair that i have to pay that much money when i was falsely informed , is there any way at all that something can happen to fix this ?

docs.title: ZTE MF923 WAN Connection Status Disconnected
docs.text: hllo,i have a zte mf923 wireless access point. i had literally the exact same model that lasted me a year and all of a sudden of course when i needed it, it wouldn't work. i went and bought the exact same model because tech support didn't know how to fix it, and it worked while in the store, but now i brought it home and have the same issue.what happens is that the device connects to the wwireless network, i have signal, and i can even get out to it fine from my cell phone and laptop. when my device is connected to it, i can reach the http://wwirelesswifimanager (internal management website for the device). on there though it says "wan connection status" and it says "disconnected". when disconnected i can't reach the internet from any device.support doesn't know what to do and i just bought a new one, so i'm not sure what's happening. has anyone else had this issue?

docs.title: Why is the ATT coverage so bad in North Texas?
docs.text: he coverage here in north texas was once really strong. now i have to go outside to make phone calls. whats going on?

docs.title: Signal issues
docs.text: live in the country with no internet and i am constantly dropping calls or have no service inside my home. i have a galaxy 7, what are my options to improve signal strength? i am considering stocking back to verizon at this point, i'm very frustrated.

docs.title: Microcell
docs.text: w've been in our house 3 years and have never very good signal here or the surrounding area (a rural area). we've been wwireless customers since we got our first cell phones about 17 years ago. i called about a microcell and was told we could buy one, but my parents live a couple miles from us and got theirs for free due to poor signal in the area. why the discrepancy? why is their microcell free our's not, even though we are "valued customers" or whatever because we've been with them so long?solved!go to solution.

docs.title: I WANT RECOMPENSE FOR TIME WASTED
docs.text: snce december 2016, i've had an ongoing issue wwirelessempting to get credit for a returned phone. after numerous phone calls, speaking with several agents, being placed on hold and passed around from department to department, my issue has yet to be resolved. i finally spoke with an agent yesterday and she shamelessly explained that this is an ongoing issue with wwireless. the agent claimed she would make the adjustment and went on to statethat the return was finally processed, and the credit would appear when i logged into my wwireless. when i logged into my wwireless today (02/28), my invoice total was still incorrect. i had to call, again, re-explain my situation, review my issue with the agent, at which time she made the appropriate adjustment. on my call of 02-27, i thanked the agent and asked if i could speak with a manager or someone who would listen to my complaint about the customer service i've received, the agent said she would listen. i explained my issue and although she was kind and sympathetic she never offered me any recompense for the time i've had to waste with something that should've been completed when i returned my phone, two months ago. after having wasted valuable work time, being passed around, disconnected, lied to, patronized and disregarded, i feel that i should have received at least a free credit for the disservices and disappointments i've encountered.i do not feel that i'm the type of customer to complain or make a huge deal out of nothing but i've made several failed wwirelessempts to voicemy concerns and disdain. i'm so dissatisfied because of this exercise that thenext phone call to wwireless will be to discontinue my service. i find this to be unfortunate asi've been a long standing customer for quite some time.

docs.title: Accessories, insurance and more
docs.text: have been a valued customer since 2007 and i never had issues until i recently update my phone to 7plus. from deceptive selling of accessories to phone insurance. when i went to the wwireless store, this agent told me to get accessories worth $500 and i only have to pay $199.00 for all. i was making sure about everything and he agreed yes. time comes that my son needed a phone, i got him an iphone 6plus. nobody told me that i can get iphone 7/7plus if i have wsatellite and i do have it for almost two years! now i end up paying the monthly cost of the phone and all comes with it. i have called 611 from my phone many times and reported this problem but they can't do anything. went to the store and they were sorry but i have to pay for it. i have wwireless telephone, directv , uverse and cellphone and i feel like being treated like this is the time to end all these with wwireless. all i need is to get this resolve, get my money back from accessories, the monthly cost of iphone since i have directv and phone insurance that i told them i don't want it. since october i got charged for $29.99 until yesterday i called back and they said they can only cancel it and give me the refund for this month. this is too much. i need to address this to the corporate and have you guys review all the calls that i did many many times!!!

docs.title: Samsung Note 7 bogo cancelled due to recall.
docs.text: upgraded a phone line to get the note 7 and opened a new line to get the second note 7 for the bogo promotion. but at that time the note 7 wasn't out yet so i pre-order it on august 5 2016. phones came in and love it until it was recalled. went to go exchange both phones to the new note 7 replacement and was told that i was still able to get my bogo promotion. then here came the second recalled on the note 7, i returned both phones to the samsung edge 7 and once again ask of i was still getting the bogo. wwireless worker called in and asked if i was still going to get the bogo, and we where told yes. 4 months later, the bogo promotion has not kicked in. i called customer service and was told that since i return the note 7 out of the promotion date, i have lost the promotion. i told wwireless that there was a world wide recall on the note 7 where it was mandatory to return the phone. which wasn't my fault, i have lost the bogo promotion. is anyone having this problem and what should i do next.

docs.title: AT&T refuses to unlock my phone that has been paid off for 10 months and my phone bill is paid off
docs.text: recently switched to t mobile on friday and needed my wifes phone unlocked from wwireless. filled out multiple requests online and called many times they refuse to be helpful and give a crap that they are hi-jacking my wifes phone. i have been a loyal customer for 13 years can't believe this, there is no way this is even legal. they keep avoiding the fact of even making an wwirelessempt to resolve this issue instead it's we will send you and email with your unlock code in a couple hours, that's there go to move and i'm done hearing it give up my phone it aint yours.

docs.title: AT&T Negative Feedback

docs.title: NEXT return problem!
docs.text: returned 2 next phones, after upgrading, as instructed. i have tracking on both that say they were delivered. well, one number got a text saying the phone was received, nothing left to do. the other number got a text saying it was not received, will be charged the remaining balance, and to call the number listed to speak with someone if i have questions. the wwireless employee on the phone had no idea how to help. he couldn't look up the tracking information, didn't have a way for me to submit my proof, and assured me that whenever they receive the phone they will subtract the charge. he said i can go to a corporate store and show them my proof. well, the store had no clue and it was not their area.fast forward 2 weeks, and we receive a package from wwireless with the returned next phone inside! there was a letter claiming that they received the phone past the deadline and so therefore they cannot accept it, and we get to keep it, and they will only charge us the remaining balance. (we're so lucky).um, we don't want to keep the phone and pay the remaining balance, which is why we upgraded. that's what next promotes, you can upgrade without having to pay off the balance. we returned the phones right away, and they were both delivered! they must have misplaced the first one for a while (on accident or purpose?) and then when they finally checked it, said it was too late and sent it back. not fair!what do i do? who do i contact? how can i show my saved pictures of the tracking information showing delivered? if i did my part and dropped it off at usps, the rest is out of my hands, and i should not be charged.anyone deal with this before?

docs.title: What does it take?????

docs.title: UNLOCK CODE.
docs.text: went in to an wwireless store to request that my phone be unlocked.they explained that i needed to fist pay off my next pay account balance with was 695 dollars.i did and next i was instructed to pay off the past account balance which i did.i am on the account with a friend who is unable to pay his bill on time...so i spent just under a 1000 dollars at this point.i explain to them that i am going to another company and ask is it ok if i port my number over now while i wait the few days for my unlock code? the wwireless employee said it would not be an issue.so i port my number over.i check my status online to see if my request went threw and it was denied.i just got off the phone with wwireless customer service and there telling me that my line needed to be active in order for me to get my code which is something i was never told.... the lady on the phone keeps offering me a free tablet for my troubles and i only want my unlock code so i can use the phone i paid for..what can i do

docs.title: +Poor outgoing call audio
docs.text: m wife and i upgraded to new iphone 7's nearly 4 weeks ago. right out of the box, both phones had poor outgoing phone call audio. people i talk to repeatedly ask me if i'm on speaker phone and tell me i sound like i'm in a tube or tunnel, that i sound "cavey" and distant. other times, even in the same call, the audio turns garbled and unintelligible. some calls get so bad that the person can no longer haer me and hangs up on me! the audio routinely fades in and out also. here is the real strange part, the incoming audio that i hear is always perfect, never changes. the problem is always outgoing only. when my wife and i talk to each other, we can barely carry on a conversation. we hear each other's bad audio. the phones do ocassionally make good clear calls but they are few and far between. this problem occurs anywhere, anytime regardless of conditions or signal strength. we have had full diagnostics (phone & service) by wwireless and apple. multiple sim cards, and phones replaced 3 times!!! still ne help! we have been with wwireless for years and previously had motorola rzr hd androids. they performed flawlessly and we never had this issue until we upgraded to the iphone 7. my daughter has had an iphone 6 on this account for the last 3 years and has no problems at all. please help! we are at wits end, no one can help us. apple says it's not the phone, and i gotta believe that since we've been thru 5 new ones so far. help!

docs.title: Upgrading on the Next plan
docs.text: s, i have a phone on the next plan and it's not completely paid off yet. i know that if i want to get a new one before it's paid off that i have to turn it in. i'm wondering if it's an extra cost to switch phones or if it just restarts your plan? my phone is also cracked so i don't know if that changes things as well. please help.

docs.title: Switcher program is a joke!!
docs.text: s i made a huge mistake by switching from verizon to wwireless after being with verizon for 10 years thinking i was going to get a deal.. sadly the switcher program has been a huge nightmare. i was told if i switched wwireless would pay all my early cancellation fees from verizon, so i uploaded my final bill from verizon in november. i have been calling in and checking monthly and every rep i have talked to reassured me i was getting the rebate... so today i called in one last time to check on the status because the assured me it would be processed and mailed today. well they failed to tell me about the trade in deal when i hooked up services. how was i suppose to trade in my phone if wwireless hooked up my verizon phone on a wwireless line?? and they just barely told me after 16 weeks there was a hold up because of this??? so now nobody can help me and i am stuck with a 695.00 bill from verizon. i forgot to add i was hung up on 5 times today with wwireless and on hold with young america for 55 min just for the man to be very ignorant and rude!!!! horrible customer service!! biggest mistake i have ever made!

docs.title: Dissatisfied with AT&T Customer Reps in store during phone upgrade
docs.text: loha,i went into my local store to upgrade my iphone. i was considering the 7 or the 7plus and was apprehensive about getting the 7plus due to the size. the two representatives that were in there informed me that other than the camera, there was not any difference. i mentioned to them that i take a lot of social media pictures from my phone, so wanted the best option. the representative told me that unless i was wanting to shoot long distances the 7 would be perfectly fine. so i decided on the 7. as they were unwrapping the box and setting up my new phone, another female customer came in. she asked to speak to a manager as she had just upgraded her phone a week ago to a 7 and wanted to trade it for a 7plus. overhearing her conversation, she seemed to be told the same information, that they told her that the 7 was just as good as the 7plus, but after playing on her friends 7plus, she realized how big of a difference the camera was. this threw a red flag for me immediately and i told the rep that i'd rather have the 7plus, which he told me i could not do as he had already opened the box of the new 7. obviously, these representatives are not trained to inform the clients on the best decision for their phone needs.  after now using one of my friends 7plus phones, the camera has better usage of up closephotos (most of which i do) rather than of just long distance (as i was told in the store). as i can assure you have two customers who are dissatisfied with their upgrade experience in this situation, i advise that you implement better training for your on-floor staff. bummed.

docs.title: Bait and switch on BOGO
docs.text: wnt to univ. village store, sewwirelessle. to purchase replacement phone for daughter, june '16. was told we were eligible for bogo. signed contract. have been charged for 2 phones ever since. tried to return phone to store - cannot. store says wwireless "customer care" has to fix it. customer care says store has to fix it. it has been >7 months, over 20 phone calls, 2.5 hr trips to sewwirelessle. worst run company i have ever dealt with. have been a customer for 16 years - this is the way you treat people? am switching as soon as i can. i feel there is something illegal going on here. your stores should have properly trained employees. you need to stand by your promises and/or fix your mistakes. you can charge people for money we don't owe you, give us a bad credit rating if we don't pay, shut our phones off. everything is in your favor.  [edited to comply with guidelines]

docs.title: Updated to Android 7.0 Nougat...
docs.text: s i was able to update my s7 edge to 7.0 nougat today , and so far, i hate it. where before, i loved the marshmallow update, as it made things eisier (i.m.o.). so far, the things i have noticed about it are:priority senders has been removed from the messaging app. i really liked that as it made it so much easier to open & send a text to any of the people i deem a high priority. days like today, when i am in a rush and have gotten a lot of messages, without the "priority..." list, i am forced to either scroll down and find them in the list of messages or open my contacts and find them.can't change the color of the message bubbles. sent is a pale yellow, received is light gray.settings are now shown in a long list. this isn't as major a deal as the 1st 2 items, but i prefer the way they were done in marshmallow.anyone know how to fix the first 2 items???

docs.title: FLIPPING MY LID!!!!
docs.text: couple of days ago, i purchased a gsm unlocked iphone 6s plus off of amazon. now, the reseller didn't tell me what carrier the previous phone was with, so i did some research and found that it worked with wwireless, t-mobile and multiple others. since i've used wwireless back then, i've decided to use their services again. so, a couple days later, i purchased an wwireless sim card offline too. i just received it today, activated it, and inserted it into my phone. but here's the thing, it's saying that the sim is from a carrier not supported by the activation policy, and that i should insert a card from the supported carrier, but i don't know the carrier!!!!! now, i have an activated sim card, but n unactivated phone. so, i guess my question would be what am i to do now, because i can't return the phone or sim, and i can't afford another one. someone please help me!!!! i'm close to flipping my lid!!!

docs.title: AT&T not unlocking my phone due to technical 'glitch'
docs.text: xtremely frustrated with wwireless right now. my family and i recently moved overseas for a 6 month work assignment. after looking at my different options for overseas data/phone plans,i decided the best thing would be to suspend my plan for the 6 month period i am over here (paying 10 dollars per line while i am here to keep my number once i return) and get a sim card from one of the local carriers. seems simple enough, right? wrong. not when it comes to wwireless. in order to get a new sim card from a carrier herewwireless needs to unlock my iphone. fine. i call, pay off my phone and submit a request to have my phone unlocked. one day later i get an email that my request has been denided. i call to try and find out why i have been denied. spend 47 minutes on the phone only to be told that under normal circumstances my request should have been approved (all the information i submitted is correct, and i am eligible to have my phone unlocked) but there must be something wrong with their system keeping my request from being approved. so the first rep i talk to (who although not helpful was very nice) tells me he will create a case to be reviewed in 2 days. keep in mind i am currently in a foreign country with my wife and two small children- and none of us have a phone that works when we are out and about without wifi. so i am supposed to be happy with them reviewing my 'case' in two days time while i leave and go to work, and leave my wife on her own in a foreign city without cellular data to help her navigate? because wwireless is having a glitch and can't unlock my phone? i explain this to him and he refers me to a 'specialist' who tell me his solution to my problem is for me to pay wwireless 10 dollars a day to have access to my domestic data plan until they work out the 'glitch' with unlocking my phone. because i really want to pay this company more money because of a problem they can't solve? completely unacceptable, and this second representative was extremely rude and condescending. so i am currently waiting for them to review my 'case' but have a hunch they will find some way to make unlocking my phone more difficult than it has already been, and i will have no choice but to buy a completely new phone from a carrier here. mind you we have been loyalcustomers of wwireless for over 10 years. absolutely unacceptable service, and i have every intention of cancelling my plan and switching to another carrier when we are back in the states if this is not solved asap.

docs.title: Reporting fraudulent AT&T late billing call
docs.text: w received a fraudulent call from someone pretending to be from wwireless collections department. they said our bill was overdue and we need to pay them right now over the phone. when we said we will check it out online because our bill was not due yet. we were then told they have shut off our access to our online account and we need to pay them by credit card right now. we told them no thank you we would take care of it and hung up. our bill had a $0 balance online. just wanted someone at wwireless to know about this new scam involving them.

docs.title: AT&T Retention Department not honoring deal they gave me
docs.text: am a long time wwireless customer. i have had my landline with wwireless since they were bell south (probably 20 or more years) and i've had my internet with wwireless for as long as i've had internet service (a very long time).i am also a wsatellite customer and have been for 15+ years (long before wwireless bought out direct tv). needless to say i am a loyal customer.recently when my contract with my wireless provider expired i called the wwireless retention department to see if they could offer me a good deal to bundle my services and switch to wwireless wireless.the retention agent i spoke with was fabulous. he gave me a great deal to switch. i got off that phone call feeling like wwireless actually did care about me as a customer. i was so happy with my new plan. imagine my surprise when a couple of weeks later when i received my bill estimate and plan details the bill estimate showed none of the enticements i had been offered to switch. i had been told i would get a free iphone 7 plus a bogo iphone 7 as well as $650 in credit per line that i was transferring. the agent explained how the $650 credit per line would work as follows: i would get a $300 credit per line for all 3 lines i was transferring automatically just for switching. this should have resulted in me getting a $900 credit right off the bat. i would get the remaining $350 credit per line for turning in my old iphones at an wwireless store. he told me you cant get a much better deal than 2 free iphone 7s and $1900 in credits. i agreed.the bill estimate showed none of these credits. it also showed me as having 6bg when i was supposed to have 16gb. the retention agent told me my monthly bill would be $156.00 (which included 3 lines, 16gb of data and the monthly payment for 1 iphone- since my other 2 lines were free). it appears that was also incorrect as my plan only shows me as having 6gbs and a higher bill for 6gbs then he quoted for 16gbs. i am not sure how anyone could get by on 6gbs per month for 3 lines with one of those lines being used by a college aged person.the bill estimate shows a monthly charge for all 3 phones (no free phones) and no $900 automatic credit. when i received my bill estimate last friday (2/24) i called the landline retention department back they told me i would have to speak with the wireless retention department and transferred me. the person i spoke with in the wireless retention department told me that she saw no notes on my account about the deal the prior agent gave me and i basically if i wasnt happy i could turn in my phones. i told her there was no way that i was letting this go as i had already received and been using my phones and my relationship with my prior wireless company had been terminated. i explained that i did not imagine all the incentives i was offered to switch. i took notes of my new plan when i was on the phone with the 1st agent plus i had him on speaker phone the entire call so my husband heard every word that was said. plus there is a recording that says all calls may be recorded. i asked her to pull up the recoridng of my prior call. when she said she could not do that i requested to speak to a supervisor. she told me a supervisor would call me back before 11:00 p.m. that night. here we are 3 days later and still no return call from the supervisor.how does this happen? i had previously spent an hour and a half on the phone with the 1st retention person that gave me the deal. part of the reason the call took so long was because he was updating my account with my deals as we went. where did all those notes go? is wwireless in the business of offering deals then once the person switches over erasing those deals from the customers account? i feel like cancelling all my services with wwireless!

docs.title: Frustration with Your Company
docs.text: o whom it may concern: i have spentover ten hours so far in wwirelessempting to recover my early terminationand buyout charges. iwas a verizon customer with five lines to transfer. four smartphones were traded in and the fifthwas too old. i was promised to recover all buyout and early termination fees. this is why i switched. one of the lines took an extra month toswitch over as the iphone 7plus was on backorder. due to this i need to pay an extra month on my verizon account. i was unable to access my online verizon account as it was closed. this necessitated my needing to go into theverizon store on two occasions to have them print out myfinal bills (2).these bills pairedthe buyout/termination charges with the agreement numbers rather than the telephone number. on the second occasion i went to verizon they matched up the agreement number with the phone. i have been to the wwireless store personally on two occasions to try and straighten out this mwwirelesser. the first time a sales professional named kyle submitted all the information for me. after this i received notice from you that some information was missing. yesterday i went back to the wwireless store and kyle stated that he did not send the information on all four phones. i brought in the information again and a very capable female sales professional took over. ileft allinformation with her as she still had to fax over some paperwork. now i have received notice again that the information cannot bevalidated.i am awwireless/wsatellite customer at my home with phone, tv, and internet. i am a wireless customer with five lines. i am a professional person who does not have the time to deal with this inefficiency and lack of customer service. i will consider leaving wwireless in the very near future. i will be contacting the better business bureau and the dept. of consumer affairs if this is not straightened out. i will not waste any more of my time with this. elaine l[edited for privacy  please do not post personal information]

docs.title: Cancellation of device problems
docs.text: was given a special on 2 wwireless treks back in november 2016. i later cancelled the service for an ipad mini (because i didn't need it with the treks) but the cancellation was never executed and in february 2017, i finally escalated my issue and the device was cancelled. i was given a $20 credit because a record or note could not be found that i cancelled the service in november. there was a note for january 9, 2017that i called and cancelled the service but yet in february, the service was still active.i actually called onceper month to cancel because i saw it was still on my bill so the other notes were lost too.it's frustrating that these notes on my account get lost and wwireless is not holding themselves accountable for these notes or the order for cancellation. this also happened with my wwireless treks where it took several hours and trips to the wwireless store for them to finally find the notes that said my purchase was 100% free with the service obligation. i was finally credited with the over $200 of charges for my free treks. basically, for this recent issue, i had to pay $40 for service that i cancelled and subsequently got a $20 credit because of wwireless's inability to cancel a device. if this is happening to others in the wwireless customer base, the company is making quite a bit with this loophole  [edited to comply with guidelines]
